name: WDIMT
description:
- Why Did I Make This -

Retro Arcade Styled Game.

Not meant for anyone else to play honestly, just for friends. :)

Will compile to a single .EXE File and make it downloadable & fix some bugs after i'm finished with Personal Problems.

P.S Luna you suck.

Don't expect anything from WDIMT. I made this in 48 hours and it's only meant to be a joke between friends.
